name: Nemo_D.O
description: Nemo_D.O is a puzzle action game. Player should control the two robots simultaneously to achieve the goal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4200U CPU @ 2.30GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
